article.title: Harris Corporation Receives $18 Million Order From Air Force for Falcon III AN/PRC-117G Multiband Manpack Radios
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Harris Corporation has received an $18 million order from the U.S. Air Force Special Operations Command's Battlefield Air Operations office for the Harris Falcon III AN/PRC-117G wideband tactical radio system. The Air Force is acquiring the AN/PRC-117G to expand the use of high-bandwidth data applications.
